result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael W. ROCKLEWITZ

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
The State moves to dismiss and read.  The defendant plead to charges in 15 CF 455, 15 CF 605, 15 CM 302, 15 CF 454, 15 CF 312 and 15 CF 439.  Motion granted.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody on other matters.
This case is riding along with 15 CF 454 and 15 CF 455.
Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 09-29-15 at 1:30 p.m.  Plea date is set for 02-04-16 at 2:30 p.m.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael W. ROCKLEWITZ
Current: 2519 16th Street, Two Rivers, WI 54241 United States  (Effective: 09-15-2015)
Prior: 2309 13th Street, Two Rivers, WI 54241

Defendant in custody.   
Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Preliminary hearing set for 09-23-15 at 10:00 a.m. on 15 CF 454 and 15 CF 455.   Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photograph and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with the victims,  Jaclyn & Lee Rocklewitz except as supervised visitation and no contact with their residence.  
Minutes.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

RE:  Jaclyn and Lee Rocklewitz, on 04-05-15.
Initial appearance is set for 09-14-15 at 1:30 p.m.
